base_description: Oval, green bottle with a white pump.
part_description: Consists of a green oval body and a white pump. The pump is cylindrical and positioned at the top center of the bottle.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism consists of a tube inside the bottle that extends to the bottom. When pressed, the pump creates suction to draw liquid up the tube and out through the nozzle.
external_interaction_description: The bottle is typically used to dispense liquids like soap or lotion. Users press the pump to release the contents. It can be placed on a flat surface like a counter and refilled by unscrewing the pump.
